item.title: The best podcasts I listened
item.description: This post is an archive of the podcasts I have liked for the sheer brilliance of the interviewee. This post will be updated as I listen more. item.title: Using Python crontab correctly
item.description: In this post, we are going to examine thoroughly how to setup python-crontab correctly and debugging for possible errors and how to resolve them. For the uninitiated, python-crontab is a python package for editing cron table aka crontab used for scheduling the jobs run by cron. I have setup a cron job which runs for every hour.
